limitedTime.name: Summer of Making
limitedTime.description: Build stuff. Get stuff. Repeat.

limitedTime.name: Converge
limitedTime.description: Build Discord/Slack bots, we ship domain names, server hosting, Blahajs, and more

limitedTime.name: Reactive
limitedTime.description: Ship a website built with React, get $15 to buy a domain.

limitedTime.name: Waveband
limitedTime.description: Create a program that uses RTL-SDR, and Hack Club sends you a dongle and antenna kit.

limitedTime.name: Highway
limitedTime.description: Make any hardware project, get up to 350 USD to build it! Keyboard, game console, rocket, robot, 3d printer, etc... Then, go to a 4-day hardware hackathon @ Github HQ this summer!

limitedTime.name: Cafe
limitedTime.description: Collect cups, progress the graph, earn bonuses!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Work on a personal project in a huddle, get a cup every hour. Getting certain amounts of cups can get you special prizes! See the cafe-bulletin channel for more information!

limitedTime.name: RaspAPI
limitedTime.description: Make an API get a Raspberry Pi
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Create an original API using any programming language or framework that you prefer and get a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W to host it on! The API can be anything you want. The possibilities are endless!

limitedTime.name: Black Box
limitedTime.description: Create a constrained, interactive C program and get a portable device to run it on!

limitedTime.name: Hackpad
limitedTime.description: Design a keyboard get the parts! Please note this is only open to those who have build a Macropad previously.

limitedTime.name: Sidequests
limitedTime.description: A short-run low-volume low-effort ysws series from nora & co.
limitedTime.detailedDescription:
#1: SkinAmp (ft. phoebe!) - Ship a WinAmp skin, we'll send you the WinAmp source code on CD-R (started 2025-03-26, ended 2025-04-13).
#2: gemerald - Write something useful in Ruby, i'll send you a sticker (best few get a book!) (started 2025-04-10, ended 2025-04-25).

limitedTime.name: Lockin
limitedTime.description: Work on anything Wakatime-able on call with another Hack Clubber, spin for stickers at the end of the session.

limitedTime.name: BrowserBuddy
limitedTime.description: Build a Chrome extension, and Hack Club provides $30 to launch it on Chrome Web Store.

limitedTime.name: TerminalCraft
limitedTime.description: Build a terminal program and earn a Raspberry Pi 4
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Build & publish a cross-platform terminal app. Get 10 users, open-source it, and snag your Pi 4

limitedTime.name: Pixeldust
limitedTime.description: Make a neopixel based PCB, get the parts to make one!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Create a PCB using KiCad / other EDA. It should use neopixels and a Xiao RP2040, and act as a decoration. Once submitted you can get the parts to make one yourself!

limitedTime.name: Juice
limitedTime.description: Spend 100 hours in 2 months building a game, and we'll cover your Steam release and fund a flight to China for a pop-up shop.

limitedTime.name: Jungle
limitedTime.description: Spend time working on your game, get money to help publish it! Prizes include steam license, itch.io asset store credits, and much much more!

limitedTime.name: Infill
limitedTime.description: Design your own 3D printer mod, get $20 to build it!

limitedTime.name: Visioneer
limitedTime.description: Give your computer the gift of vision, get an esp32-s3-eye to see it through!

limitedTime.name: Hacklet
limitedTime.description: Spend two hours building a creative javascript bookmarklet, get $10 to buy a domain!

limitedTime.name: Asylum
limitedTime.description: Fast-paced hardware YSWS challenges.

limitedTime.name: Printboard
limitedTime.description: Design a 3D model that goes with the Ikea Skadis pegboard, and we will send you one!

limitedTime.name: Minus Twelve
limitedTime.description: Create a useful tool and receive a shiny new microcontroller!

limitedTime.name: Hackapet
limitedTime.description: Make a pet game, get a hackable tamagotchi clone!

limitedTime.name: Dessert
limitedTime.description: Make an Android app and earn a paid Google Developer account.

limitedTime.name: Solder
limitedTime.description: Design and solder your own custom PCB with a free electronics kit!

limitedTime.name: HackCraft
limitedTime.description: Create a Minecraft mod, and Hack Club sends you Minecraft Java!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: Join HackCraft to build and ship your own Minecraft mod. Access exclusive resources and a supportive community.
steps: Publish it on Modrinth or Hangar.
Submit your mod to Hack Club.
Receive Minecraft Java Edition and enjoy!
details: Participants will receive a Minecraft Java Edition account upon successful submission.
Support is available through our Slack community.

limitedTime.name: Cascade
limitedTime.description: Create animations with CSS and receive art supplies.

limitedTime.name: Riceathon
limitedTime.description: Customize your Linux install, and get programmer socks or a Blåhaj.

limitedTime.name: Hacky Holidays
limitedTime.description: Design a PCB holiday decoration this winter, get one shipped.

limitedTime.name: BakeBuild
limitedTime.description: Design a cookie cutter, get it shipped!
limitedTime.detailedDescription: You ship : A CAD model of a cookie cutter, we ship : A 3D printed model of your custom cookie cutter & cookies!

limitedTime.name: Retrospect (J2ME edition)
limitedTime.description: Create a J2ME game (Java MIDlet) and have it delivered on a J2ME-capable phone.

limitedTime.name: Hackaccino
limitedTime.description: Build a 3D website and get a free frappuccino.

limitedTime.name: Cider
limitedTime.description: Create an iOS app and receive a $100 Apple Developer account to publish it.

limitedTime.name: 10 Days of Tarot
limitedTime.description: Build a project or feature and get exclusive prizes for each card requirement you hit.

limitedTime.name: Tonic
limitedTime.description: Make a Jekyll theme, show it to the world, and we'll send you a Hack Club hat!

limitedTime.name: Thunder
limitedTime.description: You Ship A Slack bot. We Ship A limited edition Orpheus bucket hat.

limitedTime.name: Shipwrecked
limitedTime.description: You Ship 60 hours of work, 4 projects, and go viral. We Ship A ticket to an island hackathon in Boston.
limitedTime.detailedDescription: You ship 60 hours of coding work, four shipped projects, and make one of them go viral. We ship you a ticket to Shipwrecked, a four-day, in-person hackathon on Cathleen Stone Island in the Boston Harbor, with travel stipends available.

limitedTime.name: Neighborhood
limitedTime.description: You Ship 100 hours of coding on one project. We Ship A free summer of coding in San Francisco.
limitedTime.detailedDescription: You ship 100 hours of coding work on a single, new, open-source project. We ship you a flight to San Francisco and cover your housing, food, and transit for up to three months while you code with other teenagers.

indefinite.name: Sprig
indefinite.description: Build a JS game and play it on your own console.

indefinite.name: OnBoard
indefinite.description: Design a PCB and we'll fabricate it for you.

indefinite.name: Boba Drops
indefinite.description: Build a website and get boba!

indefinite.name: Swirl
indefinite.description: Create a quality website with Scoops, get ice cream!
indefinite.detailedDescription: Ship a static website (html + css) that has a Scoop, and get a grant for ice cream to enjoy! Scoops are made up of groups of three html / css features that add something of value to the website.

indefinite.name: OnBoard Live
indefinite.description: Design a PCB live on YouTube for $5/hour PCB credit.

indefinite.name: Grub
indefinite.description: You Ship A responsive website using only HTML and Tailwind CSS. We Ship A grant for junk food.
indefinite.detailedDescription:
The grant amount is based on the number of unique features implemented:
$6 (Basic Meal): For 2 unique features.
$8 (Refreshment Combo): For 4 unique features.
$10 (Full Combo Meal): For 6 or more unique features.

indefinite.name: Toppings
indefinite.description: You ship an interactive website using framework-less JavaScript, we ship you a grant to an ice cream parlor.

indefinite.name: Waffles
indefinite.description: You ship a full-stack web application, and we ship you a grant to a waffle house.

drafts.name: Hack A Home
drafts.description: You Ship a Home Assistant with Software,PCB and Case, We Ship a grant ($150 Max)to make it.
drafts.detailedDescription: Build a home assistant with Software,PCB and Case . We will send u a grant ($150 Max)to make it.

drafts.name: Hackumentary
drafts.description: You Ship a project with dev vlogs, We Ship points through which you can buy goodies
drafts.detailedDescription: Build a project with daily dev vlogs, we ship you points for every dev vlog you create, which you can use to purchase exciting goodies after shipping your project

drafts.name: Reef
drafts.description: Ship a deep learning project (AI/ML/LLM/NN), get a custom coral based accelerator.

drafts.name: Hackducky
drafts.description: Create A DuckyScript get a Rubber Ducky ! ( hackducky )

drafts.name: HackABand
drafts.description: ship a wristband design and we ship you fabric woven wristband with NFC chip

drafts.name: Forge
drafts.description: Design a 3D model that solves a problem and receive a custom 3D printer.

drafts.name: Vine
drafts.description: Create a song using open-source music software and receive a vinyl with your song.

drafts.name: Hack Store
drafts.description: Use a free alternative app store and get a Google Developer account.

drafts.name: Light Up
drafts.description: Design an electronic circuit with lights, and Hack Club sends you the components and gifts.

drafts.name: Aether
drafts.description: Build a Windows app, and Hack Club provides a Microsoft Store developer account.

drafts.name: Onward
drafts.description: Build a robot using Arduino and receive one.

drafts.name: Fishin Chips
drafts.description: Build TTL logic circuits without microcontrollers, get components to make them real!
drafts.detailedDescription: This is a TTL (transistor-transistor logic) YSWS, which means no microcontrollers will be given! Build fundamental digital electronics like adders, clocks, or even a 4-bit computer. Dream big, but focus on the electronic fundamentals.

drafts.name: PicoJam
drafts.description: Create a PICO-8 game, get a PICO-8 license for free!
drafts.detailedDescription: Use PICO-8 Education Edition to build a game with your own assets (art, sound effects, etc). Your game should have a basic goal and at least 2 minutes of gameplay. The top winner will receive a Physical PICO-8 Emulator Device!

drafts.name: Hack the Line
drafts.description: Get an Asterisk server running, and we'll send you a VoIP phone.

drafts.name: Constellation
drafts.description: You ship a self host, full stack website, we ship a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W to host it on

drafts.name: The Zoo
drafts.description: You ship an interactive animal themed website, we ship themed stickers and posters for top submissions

drafts.name: Jetsu
drafts.description: You ship a ML Robot, We ship a Jetson Nano / Jetson Orin Nano
drafts.detailedDescription:
Event Dates: 1st June to 31st July
Participants will receive the necessary funding to build their robots.
Before funding, participants must:
  - Submit a Bill of Materials (BOM) listing the expected components.
  - Submit their initial machine learning project on GitHub with a well-documented README.
Machine learning models will be developed on laptops to control the robots.
Coding activity will be tracked using WakaTime.
Participants must log their work hours in a detailed project journal.
Rewards & Incentives:
  - All participants who successfully complete the project will receive a Jetson Nano Developer Kit (4GB).
  - Those who invest 100+ hours will be rewarded with a NVIDIA Jetson Orin (8GB).

drafts.name: Hackclub market
drafts.description: You can buy/sell pcb's online

drafts.name: Lightsaber
drafts.description: You ship a beat saber map, we ship a(n) <undecided>.

drafts.name: Turquoise

drafts.name: Wetube
drafts.description: You ship a YouTube channel, we ship points for every video to spend on video equipment!

drafts.description: You ship a custom MIDI Synth/Controller with the firmware, we make it and send it to you!

drafts.description: You ship a pride themed website, we ship a blahaj

drafts.name: Hack Drive
drafts.description: You Ship a cool filesystem/something using FUSE, We Ship a Hack Club branded flash drive

drafts.name: Hackmouse
drafts.description: Design a PCB & case for a mouse and get the parts shipped to you.

drafts.name: The Ride
drafts.description: You ship a PCB to go on an adventure, we give you the opportunity to build an (offroad) bike at HQ and go on that adventure.

drafts.name: Trainix
drafts.description: Build an RL model for math problems and win an ESP32-S3 + OLED Module. Top 3 get an NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano Developer Kit.

drafts.name: RPG
drafts.description: Work together with other hack clubbers to fight bosses and earn awesome loot and an exclusive trading card for those who help defeat each boss!

drafts.description: Put up Hack Club posters to earn prizes.

drafts.description: Learn, build, or do something everyday for 15 days and post progress reports.

drafts.description: Collaborate on a project for 10 days, get Hack Club socks!

drafts.name: Easel
drafts.description: Build a programming language, get fudge.

drafts.name: Blot
drafts.description: Write code, make art, and get a drawing machine.

drafts.description: Website building with rewards.

drafts.name: Retrospect
drafts.description: Create a DOS game and have it delivered on a floppy disk.

drafts.description: Projects using language models.

drafts.description: Related to HAM radio projects.

drafts.name: Trick or Trace
drafts.description: Design a PCB this October, vote on the best designs, get a second grant.

drafts.name: Anchor
drafts.description: Design a VTuber-style logo for your High Seas project and receive custom stickers.

drafts.name: High Seas
drafts.description: Work on projects, earn doubloons, and compete in the Wonderdome.

drafts.name: Neon
drafts.description: Build code, get a 64x32 LED matrix.

drafts.name: Say Cheese!
drafts.description: Fit a program in a QR code, get a portable printer and maybe a Blåhaj.
drafts.detailedDescription: Fit a program inside a QR code, and get a potentially cat-themed portable printer! The best project gets a Blåhaj.

drafts.name: Cargo Cult
drafts.description: Build a Rust CLI and get a Rust book.

drafts.name: Winter Boba Drops
drafts.description: Create a winter-themed static website, get a boba plushie!
